From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Cliffjumper follows Prowl. He looks around for any down and out robots,
and sees Firedrill struggleing with Headstrong. He is torn to do his
duty, but longs for the fight. But he pushes that behind himself and
runs up to First Aid. He leans down, and grabs the damaged Protectobot
with both hands, and lets out a large grunt. He strains hardly, and
begins to drag Firstaid's body away from the chaos.

Firedrill desperately holds on to Headstrong, but the raging Predacon is
to much, and flips him of. Luckily he lands on his feet, and quickly
swings his shielding on his arm, intercepting a swing from Headstrong's
sword.
